name: Gobiotics by Sweetch - preBIULIN速 AGA
description: Gobiotics by Sweetch offers preBIULIN速 AGA, a specialized prebiotic complex described as a 'complete banquet for protective skin microbiota'. This innovative ingredient activates the full potential of the skin microbiome by selectively feeding beneficial bacteria. Available in the US through Ultrachem distributor.
notes: preBIULIN速 AGA provides comprehensive prebiotic support described as a 'complete banquet' for beneficial skin bacteria. US availability through Ultrachem facilitates easier ordering for North American formulators.
